headline: Here to Help; How to Organize Your Fridge (and Keep It Neat)
abstract: A handful of simple items can help you organize your fridge the way the pros do, to avoid wasting both food and time.
lead_paragraph: I come from a family of condiment hoarders. We love pickles, spreads, and sauces, but we canâ€™t ever seem to finish them. This used to result in a Jenga-like situation in my fridge, with jars poised to topple out and break a toe every time I reached for the milk.
